import { useState } from "react" export default function Topbar() { const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState(false); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [userPassword, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleLogin = async () => { const data = await fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/login", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ userName, userPassword }), }) } return ( <>
Database app
{showLogin && (
Log In
setUserName(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
)} ) }
